name: NPUtils_LITEv2
title: NPUtils_LITEv2
author: MdRuz
description: so called completory, all in one, for those playing with big mods. almost all features can be toggled in game settings. 1x1 assember, oil machines and oil power generation, seed growing, land water pump, optional 2x,3x ore chain. and much much more! all that, in one, sorted and separated tab.
